name: A Simple Platformer (EntropicEquanimity)
description:
2 week Game Jam-esque Final Year Project...

Version 0.2

A Simple Platformer

Controls:
Left-Click -> Attack
WASD -> Movement
Spacebar -> Jump
Shift -> Dash (Not immediately useable)

Leveling Up:
LVL 1 -> Jump + 1
LVL 2 -> Unlock Dash
LVL 3 -> Damage and Attack Speed increased
LVL 4 -> Movespeed and Jump Height increased
LVL 5 -> Jump + 1
LVL 6+ -> Max HP +10

Tips:
Try jumping on top of enemies.
You can super boost yourself in a direction by taking damage + Dash / Jump
Enemies drop Apples on death

!!! THE RED BUTTON DELETES YOUR PROGRESS !!!

To-Do List:
